entry.title: $2538 // Brand new building in ♥♥♥ Bed-Stuy offering 24 luxury rental u
entry.content:
1 Bed / 1 Bath at 1409 Fulton St, Brooklyn, NY 11216, USA in Bed-Stuy, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Introducing 1409 Fulton, a brand new building in Bed-Stuy offering 24 luxury rental units. All units feature large sun-filled windows, brand new appliances, and central a/c. Select units provide spacious balconies and panoramic city views. Amenities include an elevator, lounge, gym, laundry room, and roof deck. Transportation options feature easy access to the A and C trains at Nostrand Avenue, as well as the Long Island Rail Road (LIRR). Net Effective Pricing advertised.

AMENITIES
Central A/C
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Elevator
Laundry in building
Gym
Wheelchair Accessible
Lounge
Roof access
Skyline view
Outdoor Space
Common courtyard
Stainless Steel Appliances
Dishwasher
Stone countertops
Bike storage

TEXT Kate at 3-four-seven-834-sixteen-88 and mention this ad. I also have plenty of other listings in the same neighborhood, just ask!
